name: untitled (itch)
description:
Oppressive footmen patrol a walled in neighbourhood. Will you make it through the day?

CONTROLS
W A S D or Left thumstick to move
Arrow Keys or Right Thumstick to peak down streets

Avoid patrols and go about your business


WARNING: This is my first go at trying to make something both political and really really abstact/intentionally kinda broken. Please let me know if this game made sense at all.
Though in saying that i didnt get the school done, thats not on purpose. If you see a building and think "wtf is this"; its a school.

@RadMcCoolGames
